description: Coherence thresholds calibrated using multi-run VLM aggregation (median of 3 runs). Thresholds set ~3-5 points below aggregated median for stable gating. Black frames and hard flicker are disallowed globally.

calibration.notes: Thresholds tightened based on aggregated median metrics from 3 VLM runs per sample. Reduces false passes while avoiding VLM variance noise.

sample-001-geometric.notes: Static spinning top with camera push-in. Thresholds calibrated from 3-run aggregated median.

sample-002-character.notes: Character head turn - high quality sample. Tightened thresholds to 95 based on consistent 100% median.

sample-003-environment.notes: Camera pan across cafe. Thresholds adjusted based on stable median, with artifact tolerance for VLM variance on single runs.

sample-004-motion.notes: Person walking - simple motion, maintains strict thresholds. Consistent 100% median confirms near-perfect quality.

sample-005-complex.notes: Complex time-lapse. Significantly tightened from 70/80/65 based on stable 88/85/10 median. Previous relaxed thresholds no longer needed.

humanReview.notes: Lens flare artifacts visible in end frame. VLM now reports low artifact severity with aggregated metrics.

sample-006-multichar.notes: Mug + barista depth scene. Thresholds set 3 points below median for stable gating.

humanReview.notes: User reported vessel changes and extra cup appearing. Hardened prompts applied. VLM now reports 98% object consistency.

sample-007-occlusion.notes: Occlusion test. Thresholds tightened from 88/85 based on stable 90/90 median.

sample-008-lighting.notes: Lighting transition. Thresholds tightened from 85/85 based on stable 90/90 median.

humanReview.notes: User reported flicker and Ring-style flashes. Hardened prompts applied. VLM now reports 10% artifact severity median.
